title: Magic Square Acquires Token Launchpad TruePNL in Strategic Expansion
description: In a strategic move that underscores the growing integration within the web3 ecosystem, Magic Square, a web3 app store with backing from Binance Labs among other prominent investors, has announced its acquisition of TruePNL, a token launch platform known for its innovative approach to project listings.  The acquisition, completed for an undisclosed cash sum, marks […]

title: Tyler Perry Halts Studio Expansion Amid AI Advancements
description: Filmmaker Tyler Perry has made a decisive move in response to groundbreaking artificial intelligence (AI) developments that could revolutionize the entertainment industry. Perry, renowned for his extensive work in film and television, has decided to halt plans for an $800 million expansion of his Atlanta studio, citing the remarkable capabilities of OpenAI’s latest text-to-video model, […]

title: Foresight Ventures Clarifies Non-Involvement in OX.FUN’s Latest Fundraising Effort
description: In a recent development that has stirred the crypto investment community, Foresight Ventures, a prominent player in the venture capital space, has taken to social media to set the record straight regarding its alleged involvement in the fundraising activities of OX.FUN is a decentralized perpetual contract trading platform.  On February 24, Foresight Ventures issued a […]

title: MTN Nigeria Transforms Customer Service with OpenAI Integration
description: MTN Nigeria has revolutionized its customer service capabilities by successfully integrating OpenAI into its Zigi Chatbot. In collaboration with Microsoft and Chatbot service provider Superbo, the telecom giant has ushered in a new era of artificial intelligence-driven customer interaction, setting a standard for the industry across Africa. Powered by ChatGPT version 3.5, the MTN Zigi […]
